title: Bots in Game
body:
I just did a game, my first game in more than a year, and it was an ARAM. I was with a leaver, 3 bots, and me. Against 5 bots

What has your game become?

replies.body: Hopefully you remembered to report those bots! Without a report, we don't have the game data where you saw the bots, so we won't have much proof to work off of.
